title: Admiral Function Discovery — discovery
text: object class spec_tbl_df (inherits tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) 222 rows 9 columns.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: get_admrial_deprecated(): Returns tibble deprecated functions admiral, admiralonco, admiralophtha, admiralvaccine packages. get_admrial_superseded(): Returns tibble superseded functions admiral, admiralonco, admiralophtha, admiralvaccine packages. get_fns_with_keyword(): Returns character vector functions passed keyword help file. example, function can used find deprecated superseded functions admiral universe, admiral package include #' @keywords deprecated #' @keywords superseded function's roxygen2 comments.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
code: get_admrial_deprecated()  get_admrial_superseded()  get_fns_with_keyword(package, keyword, lib.loc = NULL)

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: package character string naming installed package. keyword string keyword identify lib.loc character vector directory names R libraries,     NULL.  default value NULL corresponds     libraries currently known.  specified library trees used     search package.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
code: get_admrial_deprecated() #> # A tibble: 10 × 2 #>    package     fn                           #>    <chr>       <chr>                        #>  1 admiral     derive_param_extreme_event   #>  2 admiral     derive_var_basetype          #>  3 admiral     derive_var_confirmation_flag #>  4 admiral     derive_var_last_dose_amt     #>  5 admiral     derive_var_last_dose_date    #>  6 admiral     derive_var_last_dose_grp     #>  7 admiral     derive_var_merged_cat        #>  8 admiral     derive_var_merged_character  #>  9 admiral     derive_vars_last_dose        #> 10 admiralonco call_aval_fun                get_admrial_superseded() #> # A tibble: 0 × 2 #> # ℹ 2 variables: package <chr>, fn <chr> get_fns_with_keyword(package = "admiral", keyword = "superseded") #> NULL
